DataElement.preferredName: National Cancer Institute NCORP Patient Rural Addrerss Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Text term to signify whether a patient address is rural according to NCI NCORP (National Cancer Oncology Research Program) criteria.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: National Cancer Institute NCORP Patient Rural Address
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: The Federal Government's principal agency for cancer research. NCI conducts, coordinates, and funds cancer research, training, health information dissemination, and other programs with respect to the cause, diagnosis, prevention, and treatment of cancer. Part of the National Institutes of Health of the United States Department of Health and Human Services._A set of people with some shared element. The substance of shared element varies widely, from geography to a situation to interest to lives and values. The term is widely used to evoke sense of collectivity._A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary._Of or pertaining to the country as opposed to the city. (American Heritage Dictionary)_The location at which an organization or person can be reached. (from American Heritage Dictionary)_

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: The National Cancer Institute, part of the National Institutes of Health of the United States Department of Health and Human Services, is the Federal Government's principal agency for cancer research. The National Cancer Institute conducts, coordinates, and funds cancer research, training, health information dissemination, and other programs with respect to the cause, diagnosis, prevention, and treatment of cancer. Access the National Cancer Institute Web site at http://www.cancer.gov.:A set of people with some shared element. The substance of shared element varies widely, from geography to a situation to interest to lives and values. The term is widely used to evoke sense of collectivity.:A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.

Concepts.definition: The Federal Government's principal agency for cancer research. NCI conducts, coordinates, and funds cancer research, training, health information dissemination, and other programs with respect to the cause, diagnosis, prevention, and treatment of cancer. Part of the National Institutes of Health of the United States Department of Health and Human Services.

A set of individuals with some shared element. The substance of shared element varies widely, from geography to a situation to interest to lives and values. The term is widely used to evoke sense of collectivity.
A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.

Property.preferredDefinition: Of or pertaining to the country as opposed to the city. (American Heritage Dictionary):The location at which an organization or person can be reached. (from American Heritage Dictionary)

Concepts.definition: Of or pertaining to the country as opposed to the city. (American Heritage Dictionary)
A standardized representation of the location of a person, business, building, or organization.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Something distinguishable as an identifiable class based on common qualities.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.: One that makes something available.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

PermissibleValues.value: Yes, lack of proximity to cancer practice/center

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.: The state or quality of being next; immediate nearness either in time, place, blood or alliance.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.
The state or quality of being next; immediate nearness either in time, place, blood or alliance.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: all components of an address, including building number, street name and type, city, state, postal code, and country.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Type; a subdivision of a particular kind of thing.

Concepts.definition: Something distinguishable as an identifiable class based on common qualities.
